Feel free to record the food and drinks you had today.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.acceptanceContent: By accessing and using We Diet ("the Service"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
termsOfService.serviceDescriptionContent: We Diet is a social wellness platform that allows users to:
termsOfService.serviceFeature1: Track daily meals, exercise, and weight management
termsOfService.serviceFeature2: Record and share fitness journey progress
termsOfService.userAccountsContent: To use certain features of the Service, you must register for an account. You agree to:
termsOfService.userAccountsItem2: Maintain the security of your account credentials
termsOfService.userAccountsItem3: Be responsible for all activities under your account
termsOfService.userAccountsItem4: Notify us of any unauthorized use
termsOfService.userConductItem1: Post harmful, offensive, or inappropriate content
termsOfService.userConductItem2: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
termsOfService.userConductItem5: Share false or misleading health information
termsOfService.privacyContent: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the Service, to understand our practices.
termsOfService.thirdPartyContent: Our Service integrates with third-party platforms including:
termsOfService.thirdPartyNote: Your use of these services is subject to their respective terms and privacy policies.
termsOfService.disclaimersContent: The Service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not provide medical advice and recommend consulting healthcare professionals for medical concerns.
termsOfService.limitationContent: We shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of the Service.
termsOfService.modificationsContent: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective upon posting to this page.
termsOfService.terminationContent: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for violations of these terms.
termsOfService.contactContent: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
termsOfService.governingLawContent: These terms are governed by the laws of Japan.

hero.subtitle: It may be difficult to continue alone, but with companions it becomes enjoyable

product.title: Diet Support
product.description: This is an SNS-style app focused on exercise records, health, and food.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.collectionContent: We Diet ("the Service") may collect the following personal information:
privacyPolicy.collectionItem4: Information provided by external services such as Facebook and Google
privacyPolicy.usageContent: We use the collected personal information for the following purposes:
privacyPolicy.usageItem1: Providing, operating, and improving the service
privacyPolicy.usageItem3: Creating statistical data (in a form that cannot identify individuals)
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyContent: We will not provide personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
privacyPolicy.managementContent: We implement appropriate security measures to prevent leakage, loss, or damage of personal information.
privacyPolicy.cookiesContent: This service may use cookies to improve the service. If you do not wish to use cookies, you can disable them in your browser settings.
privacyPolicy.externalServicesContent: This service integrates with the following external services:
privacyPolicy.externalServicesNote: Please check the official websites of each service for their privacy policies.
privacyPolicy.contactContent: For inquiries about the handling of personal information, please contact us at:
privacyPolicy.changesContent: This privacy policy may be changed due to changes in laws or service improvements. When changes are made, we will notify you by posting them on this site.
